casebody.data:
No. —.

Ex parte: In the Matter of Julius Shapiro et al., Individually and as Copartners, doing business as Shapiro & Company, Bankrupts, Petitioners. Submitted June 2, 1924. Decided June 9, 1924. Mr. Jerome C. Jackson and Mr. Melvin H. Dalberg for petitioners.

Motion for a stay herein denied.
